channel.title: Gaming on Insignificant Gamer
channel.description: Recent content in Gaming on Insignificant Gamer

item.title: Are New Developers Caught in the Crosshairs of Today's Gamers?
item.author: justirish.insignificant@proton.me (Just_Irish / Sean R.)
item.description: Watching news about the developer Build a Rocket Boy about their apparently horrible game MindsEye got me wondering if us gamers have become too damn critical… No, no we haven’t.

item.title: Before You Buy- Mechwarrior 5 Clans
item.author: justirish.insignificant@proton.me (Just_Irish / Sean R.)
item.description: A quick and dirty rundown of Mechwarrior 5: Clans after its intial release; not eloquent nor professional in the slightest.

item.title: Before You Buy- The Forever Winter
item.author: justirish.insignificant@proton.me (Just_Irish / Sean R.)
item.description: A quick and dirty rundown of The Forever Winter after its intial release into early access; not eloquent nor professional in the slightest.
